  Task 1
My max un-signed int = 4294967295
std::u32::MAX = 4294967295

My max signed int = 2147483647
std::i32::MAX = 2147483647

My min signed int = -2147483648
std::i32::MIN = -2147483648

    Task 2
My f32 epsilon = 0.00000011920929
std::f32::EPSILON = 0.00000011920929
My f64 epsilon = 0.0000000000000002220446049250313
std::f64::EPSILON = 0.0000000000000002220446049250313

    Task 3
sum_a-1 = 0
sum_b-1 = 0.00000000011102230246251565
Both should be 0.00000000011102230246251565

    Task 4
d1=0.7999999999999999
d2=0.8
d1==d2 ? => false
d1~=d2 ? => true
